content.rendered:
Today I need your help! I need to select a design for a box art cover, or propose a different idea. Here are the options:

Other options:

5. A high school building in the bottom left corner with stairs leading to a university campus in the top right corner. On the steps are students who are climbing to the university.

6. Think of something and let me know in the comments!

Any of these options catch your eye? If you have any ideas, please let me know what you think and why. Thank you!

jetpack-related-posts.title: So, you want to launch a board game on Kickstarter? Read this first. (2019)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Sorry for my one month hiatus from writing blog posts- during this time I have been managing the campaign for Daggers Highschool. Anyway, Kickstarter is what I want to talk about in this blog post. There's already a wealth of information on this topic online, and so for…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Interview with the Friendly Boardgamer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Friendly Boardgamer just released an interview featuring me! You can check out the original article here: https://thefriendlyboardgamer.wordpress.com/2019/06/05/jorge-zhang-daggers-highschool/ Here is the article: This interview is with Jorge Zhang who is the designer of Daggers Highschool, a game about bribing your way in to the best University. We also talked about…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Board Game Designer, Artist, and Owner of Vindicated Entertainment. A Conversation with Vincent Baker
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Vincent Baker is an impressive person in the board game industry. He started his path to becoming a board game entrepreneur while he was still in high school, and was nominated student entrepreneur of the year by YES Carolina in 2011. He's been busy since then, and you may have…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Earn $100/month with Capterra. Can someone explain this to me?
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Ok, yes, clickbait-y title. And something I would normally never post: something reminiscent of a pyramid scheme. That being said, I've recently discovered this site called Capterra, and I absolutely need to know how in the world they remain profitable. It was incredibly easy for me to make money with…

jetpack-related-posts.title: The Fantasy Trip Legacy Edition Rulebook Reviews
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This game is HUGE. There's so much in the box that I could write 3 or 4 separate reviews. That's why I decided to write a "Rulebook Reviews," because there are multiple reviews all packed into one! Want to just read the part you are interested in? You can use…

jetpack-related-posts.title: A Brief Guide to Board Game Geek
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This post was inspired by Benjamin, who asked about tips for using Board Game Geek from the perspective of a game designer. Board Game Geek is super important for game designers to use, but also very unintuitive. It took me a very long time to get used to the site,…
